https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qBxMhcmNnFniuDAZTKEHcSgKtsn.jpg Set in 1879 Paris. An orphan girl dreams of becoming a ballerina and flees her rural Brittany for Paris, where she passes for someone else and accedes to the position of pupil at the Grand Opera house. Ballerina
